name: Chained Cars Impossible Stunts
description:
Chained car is a new and unique phenomenon in car simulation. In this game you are dealing with two joined cars and your task is to limit your speed and avoid them unchanged. The player has to make sure that his car which is in chained alliance with another car is moving towards its destination in limited time. Chained cars look simple game but actually it needs special driving skills and perfect car driver to maintain speed before it clash while racing.
Game Features:
Detailed 3d Environment
Smooth and Realistic Car Controls
Lots of challenging Missions
Beautiful Asphalt Racing Tracks
Free to play
